website_summaries.verdict: An exceedingly popular pet sling recognized for its sleek design and shoulder comfort.
pros: Reversible design offers a variety of style and color options
Built-in safety collar hook keeps pet safely in place
Bag is machine washable for easy cleaning

customer_reviews.title: This sling is absolutely perfect for carrying my dog
customer_reviews.text: This sling is absolutely perfect for carrying my dog. My dog weighs 11.5 lbs and she not only fits perfectly but she really loves being in it. This sling is something I will be using alot as its so comfortable for me to carry and doesn't hurt my shoulders. I highly recommend this sling to anyone with a small dog. The sling looks exactly as described. It's a little long as I'm very petite, but from reading another review, I simply just made a knot and now it's just perfect. I couldn't be happier. I just used it a few days ago at a Bark in the Park baseball game and had people asking me where I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Dachshund loves Sling.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical that it would be big enough and that our dog would tolerate it but, our 12 lbs dachshund loves his Doggy Sling! We are having some work done on the house which makes our pup very anxious. The Sling almost acts like a thunder shirt for him.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie L Regan

customer_reviews.title: Our Chiweenie loves it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our chiweenie "Leia" only wants to be with us 24/7. And her cute little eyes make it impossible not to pick her up. But this can make it difficult to get things done around the house. Now with the Pet Sling, she is totally content being "attached" to one of us, and we can get things done! She is very comfortable in it, and fits perfectly. She is about 14 lbs. We love this product, and totally recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Nash

customer_reviews.title: Furry Fido
customer_reviews.text: If only it was adjustable, I would have given it five stars. Remedy was to pull out my sewing machine and take off about four inches of the shoulder strap. Overall, very nicely made and works well for the purpose intended. it does have a tendency to catch a lot of static electricity and dog hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful pet sling!
customer_reviews.text: My 5lb chihuahua just took to this immediately! She cuddled right in the pouch and eventually just went to sleep totally content! She loves to be held and just follows me around the house as I try to get my housework done. I couldn't hold her because I needed to use my hands. Now I just put her in here and get my work done while she sleeps next to my body. I love being hands free. Thank you for this well made adorable sling.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Marie

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: The material that's used is cheap and slippery and doesn't latch onto the rings very well. I ended up having to tie the straps in knots to get it to stay in place, otherwise my poor old gal would have hit the pavement when the straps slipped out of the rings. Also, the black color isn't good for a dog who sheds. And the hair doesn't come out of the wide-weave material very easily.
customer_reviews.author: wambam77

customer_reviews.title: Serves it's purpose
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I wanted a comfy carrier to take our 15lb mini poodle to the airport in. With his weight, it would hurt your neck after a while, but the wide strap helped alleviate some of the pressure. Our dog was super comfy and loves his bag. Just be mindful if you have a very small dog, the bag might swallow them up unless you put a pillow at the bottom! Overall very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome! I take my 12lb maltipoo to work with ...
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! I take my 12lb maltipoo to work with me from time to time and often have to leave him at my desk to go to lunch. So excited to have this so I can bring him along with me now and have my hands free to run errands as well. It's also very comfortable and my husband can use it to. Highly recommend for all you dog lovers out there!
customer_reviews.author: Eyeris

customer_reviews.title: Sling is not adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Product delivered was not as advertised. Description stated that there were metal rings on the sling to adjust for the height of the person using the sling. Sling did not contain metal rings and was not adjustable. Therefore it could not comfortably be used by me and my wife to carry our chihuahua. Returned sling to Amazon on 01/23/2018. Waiting for my refund.
customer_reviews.author: William Gowers

customer_reviews.title: Hate That I Love It
customer_reviews.text: I actually hate that I like this so much. It looks and feels silly, but it's kind of great. Puppy likes it too! Now he can see what's going on when I am cooking in the kitchen. It also helped me keep his little feet off of the cold and ground during a recent snow storm.
customer_reviews.author: CSRTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Finally a sling that works!
customer_reviews.text: This sling appears to be well made, and appropriately sized. My dog weighs 12 pounds, and fits in it nicely. It would be nice if it was slightly shorter, or if I was slightly taller...I'm 5'3", but I'm happy with it nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Pugalesco

customer_reviews.title: Love this sling!
customer_reviews.text: This sling enabled me to take my 14 year old mini dachshund on walks with my boxer. He couldn't keep up before and I had to leave him home. He loves being right next to me and I can pet him while we are enjoying our walk. The only negative is that in order to look out he sometimes chokes himself on the sides because of his short legs. I think it might work better with dogs with longer legs. However I love it and at least he can go with us again. It's also very comfortable on my shoulder!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica S

customer_reviews.title: My 16 pound mini dachshund loves it!! I ...
customer_reviews.text: My 16 pound mini dachshund loves it !! I am only 5'2 so she lays low . I wish it was adjustable
customer_reviews.author: Geena

customer_reviews.title: It stretches out after a while.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to take with us on our trip to NOLA. We visit often and like to take our 14lb pup with us, who tires after about 30 mins of continuous walking (she’s little). The sling was perfect until about 2 hours of continuous wear. It started to stretch out. By day two of wearing it about 3-4hrs it had stretched down so far it was hitting my thighs (I’m 5’5). I’m going to try washing it to see if it’ll shrink a bit, but it’s a shame because the concept is fantastic and my pup LOVED it. Would be great if the fabric was stronger.
customer_reviews.author: Gypsygirl

customer_reviews.title: NOT ADJUSTABLE
customer_reviews.text: This product says, adjustable! Not adjustable! Very small. Looks bigger in in the sellers picture, but it’s not in person. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Henne

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I love the Furry Fido, so does my mini schnauzer puppy, Yumi. I bought it when she was too young to walk outside, and have continued using it now that she is a bit older. I don't leave the house without it if we are going on longer outings, if we are going to crowded areas, or to run errands. She is approximately 8 lbs now, and she has long legs, but she fits easily. I'm 5'3 and the Furry Fido sits a little lower on my hip, but is very comfortable. I'm so happy with this purchase, and hope she doesn't outgrow it!
customer_reviews.author: Carlie

customer_reviews.title: Dog is comfortable, good product!
customer_reviews.text: This sling has made it easier when I need to bring my dog around. I initially purchased this product when my dog’s knee cap kept slipping out of place/dislocating, so I brought her around with me when I went out as I was worried she’d get hurt at home by herself. It’s a good size, soft, and feels/looks comfortable. It’s durable, sturdy, and the product also comes with a collar/leash holder as a precaution as well. It’s a good product, and my dog seems comfortable when in it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Comfy for both of us!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect comfy sling for my Georgie. He's 8 lbs and a bundle of energy. Put him in the sling and he's out like a light. This sling is great when we spend time at the boutique together. When he starts getting tired from greeting guests, he happily gets in and snuggles. It's cozy, roomy for him and comfy on my shoulder too. I like the added mini clip for his collar which is ideal if we run into a store together. Most hardly notice when I have him with me. The convenience of taking him along for a quick shopping trip vs leaving him in the car is worth it to me.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Oz

customer_reviews.title: Soft n Snuggly Puppy Sling
customer_reviews.text: My lil 5lb Chihuahua, absolutely loves hanging out with me in this sling all day long or when we go out and about. He’s a lover and a snuggler, so when he’s laying around the house in his bed while I work etc., and I pull out the sling, I swear he dances- starts running around because he knows it’s snuggle w Mommy time ♥️ He will tuck his nose into the pocket and fall fast asleep, it has even helped minimize his barking because when he’s all snuggled up with me, it takes away his fear of strangers or strange noises. Love this thing! Wish I had one when he was a puppy!
customer_reviews.author: LNM

customer_reviews.title: really difficult to use, doesn’t really fit well.
customer_reviews.text: my dog is not tiny but she’s small and thin and weighs about 12 pounds, it kind of holds her weight but half of her body is out. also i’m afraid of her getting choked on the part where her head hangs out of the sling, I wish it was safer because I really need a proper sling for her because I have chronic pain and can’t really hold her while standing up for more than few minutes, and it gets really hard on public transportation.
customer_reviews.author: Guy

customer_reviews.title: Sling is a great for small dogs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for use with a dachshund rescue who was scared of everything. He was too big for the carrier even though he was within recommended weight. The quality of the bag was very nice. The strap could have been longer on me but I am a plus size woman. I ended up doing the fast Amazon return through Kohl’s and having a carrier custom made deeper/longer for my dachshund. **The company took my feedback seriously. This carrier will work great for shorter dogs.
customer_reviews.author: D. Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Dog and owner approved
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this sling! I have several shih tzus, who I take places 1 at a time, and they get tired (or are afraid of being stepped on in crowds). I simply place them in the sling and they look "cool" with 1 arm hanging out. I get TONS of compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Loved by all!
customer_reviews.text: I am "Staff" to a 9-pound Shih tzu who insists on being carried in the afternoons while I'm trying to get stuff done. The pet sling leaves me hands free to take care of household chores while the dog naps. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Marion S.

customer_reviews.title: Hercules Loves It
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves to go places and ride in this sling. It is too thick for warm weather but when cooler weather prevails we use this sling often. People don't even notice him hanging there because he is black like the sling. Often times, we take him in stores that don't allow animals but they don't realize that he is there. When I take him on public transportation from time to time people don't notice him until we are just about to get off. The sling washes easily and holds up well.
customer_reviews.author: sonny

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy for both dog and person.
customer_reviews.text: This sling is perfect. My dog is a black pomeranian and she fits perfectly! She's so comfy that she barely moves and some times it takes people a little bit to even notice her. It is also very comfortable to wear and sometimes I even forget I'm wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Payne

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured!
customer_reviews.text: Picture shows carrier hanging around pocket of jeans but it actually hangs around waist. I'm 5'9" so I'm about average for a guy. Picture shows a medium sized dog with room to spare but my small Yorkie takes up most of the carrier and if I had to carry around a medium sized dog of 10 pounds or more it would be very uncomfortable! Gave it 3 stars because it does work for a small less than 10 lb. dog.
customer_reviews.author: Mef111

customer_reviews.title: Not Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Our dog is a smaller terrier and she fit without any concerns that she would fall out of the carrier. I didn't understand how to use the clip collar that came with it. We bought this so our teenager could carry her dog through the airport. She's a smaller frame and just couldn't get the carrier to fit comfortably across her shoulders. I am taller and stronger but I also couldn't find a comfortable position either. We returned it in the end.
customer_reviews.author: BeccaNAZ

customer_reviews.title: WAY TOO SMALL FOR MY 10lb DOG!
customer_reviews.text: While the sling seems like a great idea, it really is made of a very thin material, and it is WAY TOO SMALL. My dog weighs 10lbs and OVER HALF of her body sticks up out of the sling! I could never NOT keep both hands on her while she is in it, she would definitely tumble right out (and the tether that comes with it would not at all keep her in it and truly serves no purpose! While it may hold the weight of a 13+lb dog, it certainly wouldn't fit their body down inside! I really can never use this, total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: james k.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this sling!! I had tried a front backpack carrier and she didn’t like it. I bought this and couldn’t be happier with this choice! I have a 6 pound (17 year old) Pekingese and she stays very calm when I put her in this. Her vision isn’t the best so she gets anxious if she isn’t right by me. In this, she’s protected and right next to me, not underfoot or wandering around. I can vacuum, fold laundry, water plants all while wearing this with her in it. I’m very glad to have this!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice sling and an even better company!
customer_reviews.text: Update: The company contacted me apologizing for my disappointment with the product and gave mea full refund. Due to this fact and the fact that they took my review into consideration for future products i have changed my star rating to five stars. This is a nice dog sling but it is a little too big for my tiny poodle. He has to try to stand up when hes in it so he can look out and when he lays down it hits him tight at the neck and he chokes.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Good for walks in the fall/winter!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this sling almost everyday for my walks with my boy. He tends to get stubborn and will refuse to walk sometimes so that’s when I pick him up and place him in the sling so that he can still enjoy being outside! My guy is really little so it’s pretty safe for him as he fits really snug into the sling. I can’t say that the sling has many features that make it “safe” but if your pup fits into it, it should be snug enough that it will also be safe. It’s easy to wash and is very soft for both your furry friend and you! I would recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: This is sturdy, my 13lb dog seems quite comfortable in it ...
customer_reviews.text: This is sturdy, my 13lb dog seems quite comfortable in it ---(one dog loves to walk long and fast...my other dog has a heart condition and not as much stamina...) BUT they're inseparable so it's hard to walk them both with one raring to go and the other wanting to stop....this item solves the problem. When Lola gets tired I put her in the sling. Only complaint: the strap would benefit by being adjustable. My husband is 6'3" and it rests a bit high on him.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Anna 789

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, roomy sling. I love it; my cat refuses to be in it! :-D
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my cat wouldn't leave me alone while I was in the kitchen and trying to get stuff done. Cat does NOT like to be carried in the bag, it seems. However, when I leave it on the floor where she can watch me, it's her favorite spot to lay down and observe. :-D hahaha! So: it didn't work for its intended purpose, but while I *did* have her in the sling, it was comfortable on my shoulder, roomy for the cat, and not in my way. The cloth is made of great material, and the adjustable buckle strap doesn't press down painfully. Would absolutely buy it again if I needed to.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie C.

customer_reviews.title: Consider length of dog as well as weight when buying
customer_reviews.text: Our 10 lb Bichon-mix dog can ride in this pouch as long as I keep my arm fully around her. Our long, short dog is too long to fit comfortably in the pouch. She has to kind of sit up in the bag so she can’t safely ride without support. The bag is fine. It’s more of an issue of matching the dog to a bag that fits it’s shape as much as its weight.
customer_reviews.author: S. J. Stricker

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and thin material
customer_reviews.text: This is much thinner material than I thought it would be. Not sure how long it'll last or how secure it is for my baby. He's an 11lbs chihuahua/rat terrier mix so I shouldn't feel like his weight is too much but it almost is. This was supposed to replace an awesome one I bought for him last year that has comfortable material in it but is getting rather tattered. Idk though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small but we'll made
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected when I measured it out before buying but very cute. ***UPDATE*** I should have also added initially that I felt it was good quality and cute, it just wasn't as large on the interior as I expected. The company actually contacted me and has remedied the situation. In a world of big business that often treats us as numbers or odds (what are the odds they sue, what are the odds enough people complain....), it is refreshing and appreciated that my opinion did matter and they offered to refund. I wish the bag was slightly larger and could fit my pup.
customer_reviews.author: totoks

customer_reviews.title: Dog Bag Works Well!
customer_reviews.text: No complaints about this dog bag, which is a great way to carry around a <10 lb dog. Shoulder strap is nice and wide to distribute the weight. Didn't like the separate collar hookup at first, but then I realized, it makes sense to have it as a separate piece that's fully detachable...easier to wash the bag! A great item for a puppy who gets lonely.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: I have a 12lbs dog and he loves riding in this. It is comfortable for a while, but it gets tiring to carry quicker than a backpack style would, at least with a dog of a similar weight. Also its a blanket type fabric, it runs hot in warm weather. Overall I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for 11 lb. Chihuahua.
customer_reviews.text: My 11 Lb. Chihuahua LOVES this thing! I live in Wisconsin so the winters get brutal. I fold a small wool blanket in the bottom with it laying on the floor; I then have him get in, wrap him up and carefully slide it over my shoulder. It takes a little getting used to so be patient. Once you both learn how it hangs on your body you can relax & really enjoy it. My little guy snuggles in and with his head sticking out, gets to enjoy the sights, sounds, and smells of the outdoors like dogs were meant to do. It is well made and should last many winters. Now we don't have to give up our Walk-Walks!
customer_reviews.author: iheartmykids

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE this sling!!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this product a higher rating I would! Me and my 10lb dog LOVE IT! It's super comfy for both her and me. I saw a rating that's it's a little long but I found the length perfect (I'm 5'9). Super safe with the clip at the back, my dog just settled in and didn't want to get out!! Love it!! Material's super soft and machine washable, can't praise it enough xx
customer_reviews.author: Stacey R

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This has been a wonderful purchase. We have a little 12 lb Morkie (Maltese Yorkie) and he's getting on in years. Sometimes on longer walks he slows down and eventually just stops and sits, waiting for us to carry him. This sling is soft and easy to wear. Our Morkie is happy to still be part of the walk and see the view from higher up. It's a win-win!
customer_reviews.author: Dog Mom

customer_reviews.title: A Great Item
customer_reviews.text: This product works great! We needed something to carry our 8year old Shih Tzu in after he hurt his leg and needed some pampering while it healed. I would take both our dogs out for a walk and would put the 8 year old in carrier after he did his business so our older dog could enjoy his normal walk. I plan to bring this with me on hikes or any long walks to carry either dog.
customer_reviews.author: A. L. Secondino

customer_reviews.title: 12.5 chihuahua loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My 11yr old chihuahua mix loves it. He’s 12.5lb and no problem . He’s not crazy about getting into anything that confines him but he’s good with this. It’s soft which is important and your holding him so he feels safe. The first time we put him in it he almost fell asleep which is unusual unless he’s really comfortable. Great sling carrier!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy M.

customer_reviews.title: My chihuahua loves it
customer_reviews.text: My chihuahua is very comfortable inside. I can carry him around the house when I do my chores. He luxated his patella and the doctor prescribed strict "bed rest" for a week. Before I got the sling carrier, I would either have to carry him in my arms, which was sometimes uncomfortable for him or crate him, which he did not like. He is better now and I look forward to using the sling carrier on hikes and longer walks.
customer_reviews.author: Tzvetelina Scorza

customer_reviews.title: Really long
customer_reviews.text: Gave it 4 stars because the sling came all the way down below my hip; I am 5’6”. Still...it’s just like the picture, so that’s totally my fault. If it could come closer to my bellybutton where I could easily put my arms under her, then I would be perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great sling, comfy for me and my little fur beast!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I have a 15 year old little dog who can’t do long hikes with my young big dogs, so she rides along in her sling and is so happy! It’s comfortable on me and she is snuggled in, or sits with her front paws out to catch the breeze! When she sees her sling, she goes nuts, it’s really great!
customer_reviews.author: Therese M. Mclaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Works as designed
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. I wish there was a zipper or something to keep the dog more secure in the pouch. If the dog wanted to jump out it would be easy to escape. My dog just sits there and is really glad to be with me. Get lots of comments about "That's a great idea! where can I get one?"
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for NYC subway pet transport
customer_reviews.text: I live in NYC and this is the perfect way to quickly carry my 10 lb. chihuahua mix on and off the subway. You just grab the dog, wrap the sling around the bottom, and you're done. No fussing around. My only criticism is that the sling stretches and grows a bit longer than I would have liked, but otherwise it's well-made and a great option.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren S.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy ride for an old dog
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my brother's dog, who is old and cannot go on our long walks anymore. He weighs about 19 lbs, which is over the limit, but it works. His head and front paws hang out, but he enjoys the ride!
customer_reviews.author: Marsha

customer_reviews.title: It’s a little on the deep side.
customer_reviews.text: My dog is 7lbs. So it was a little deep for her since l had to order the med size because she has a long body. A blanket at the bottom was a great solution. Black was not the best color to get because it shows every dog hair. Sweet Dee said she loves it & gives it 5 ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product! I have a 7 pound Yorkie mix that doesn’t do well with cold weather. It gets colder than people think in Las Vegas. He also likes to be close to me all the time. He would constantly jump up and down and my feet to get me to pick him up. This has been truly life changing for him. He loves it and appears to be happpy and comfortable in it. The pet sling is made very well. It fits me just as comfortably as my dog. The quality is great! I wish there were more colors available though. For now, this will work. Awesome product, perfect price, love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great carrier for around the house
customer_reviews.text: I have a 9 lb. dog that loves being carried and held. This bag is great for around the house. Since it's open on the top with only a leash strap to secure your pet in, I would be nervous about taking this out on the town, but just moving around the house and doing chores, this bag works great.
customer_reviews.author: jacquelyn

customer_reviews.title: A  lightweight hobo carry for your pet!
customer_reviews.text: It kind of reminds me of a large material type hobo bag for a dog great idea.... there was a piece missing that attaches to the collar in case the dog jumps out other than that I found it very cute my 10 pound Chihuahua fit in there perfectly. The only thing I didn’t like was the lining I wish they would give you some choices as far as different patterns for the lining perhaps a leopard pattern or a few more solid colors. Great product sturdy easy to utilize.
customer_reviews.author: Christene

customer_reviews.title: so so
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of this sling. Unfortunately, I found the fabric to be almost flimsy and the shoulder trap is not adjustable. I am 5'6 and it hangs down by my hip almost, very uncomfortable for more than 10 minutes. I had to have the strap shortened at the tailor.
customer_reviews.author: east side photo

customer_reviews.title: Functional, too small, but good
customer_reviews.text: It should have an adjustable strap that would make it perfect! While this fits my teenage daughter and hangs right. It does not hang well on me. This actually showed up as a best in class as one of the Amazon recommendation items when you purchase, where they give you 3 types. It is soft and my dog seems to enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: B. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Not useful for the Summer.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pet sling. I had several people ask me where I got it. My Pug (she’s on the small side 12-lbs) really likes it. However, this sling is not useful for the Summer month’s. The fabric does not breath well and she got hot very quickly. I am going to look for another one that I can use for for the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Smith

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good for a small pet.
customer_reviews.text: This works pretty well for a small dog. I bought this for my 10+ pound mini poodle and it helps went he doesn't want to walk on his own anymore however he does get heavy. The sling is not adjustable and it hangs low on my hip. I find it annoying to walk with my poodle in place and he likes it. When he sees it in my hand he can't wait to hop in haha. What a Lazy boy. Lol Just Wish could adjust it to fit better.
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: My chihuahua loves this thing. I usually end up rotating it from in front to the side though, if I don’t my lower back starts hurting. My chihuahua can’t hang with the long walks that my lab likes to go on, so this works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Krishna Woods

customer_reviews.title: Yes I have human children too :)
customer_reviews.text: It is a baby bjorn for my puppy. Yes I made fun of those people and now I am one of those people. If it had a formed/structured bottom it would give Neil more security but he has never jumped out of it. It is well sewn and nice material.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Hunter Johnson

customer_reviews.title: It is not adjustable
customer_reviews.text: The advertisement says adjustable and it IS NOT. this makes the sling difficult to wear for different height people. I had to return due to inaccurate product description. VERY ANNOYING!!!
customer_reviews.author: Steve b

customer_reviews.title: Great for our Miniature Maltese!
customer_reviews.text: Now I can take our Maltese to the dog park with my German Shepard. If she gets tired or cold I can carry her with ease. She is so comfy and cozy, she doesn’t want to walk anymore. Walking is way more comfortable for me with free hands. Awesome stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Urszula M

customer_reviews.title: Way shorter than pictured
customer_reviews.text: See the man in the picture. He must be about 5 feet tall as I am 5’ 6” and the sling is Nowhere near that long. The dog fits and it’s not uncomfortable but it sure would be if I were taller. I know my husband will never use it and that’s a shame because our old dog just can’t go on walks of any length anymore and we don’t like leaving him alone when we take the other two out.
customer_reviews.author: jo

customer_reviews.title: Great for 16 lb doxie
customer_reviews.text: Love! My doxie is 16 pounds and can only walk short distances but my other two can walk longer. When she gets tired, I put her in the ouch and keep on walking. She loves it and doesn’t move. I feel like a great dog mom because she doesn’t miss out in anything!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Zabor

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: This sling is adorable and sturdy! I wish I could upload a photo of my daughter carrying our 10 lb. Pomeranian around...so cute!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I returned it and ordered another brand sling that was adjustable and it was the best decision.
customer_reviews.text: I have an 12 lbs. dachshund and she fit inside but had no room to move whatsoever. I’m also only 5’3” and with my dog in the sling her head came right to my armpit. Very uncomfortable and not adjustable at all. I returned it and ordered another brand sling that was adjustable and it was the best decision.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Scott

customer_reviews.title: I think my dog actually LIKES it much to my surprise
customer_reviews.text: Our little dog (Malte-Pom about 15 -16 lbs.) Chip seems to feel comfortable in the sling and I expected him to fight it or at least be nervous. We bought it to use on our upcoming vacation primarily to get in and out of places with other dogs as Chip can be territorial and is very vocal and noisy about it) but I was skeptical as to whether it was going to work out. Now I am hopeful, we will know soon we leave next week
customer_reviews.author: Norma Jean Fochs

customer_reviews.title: Great carrier for a small dog
customer_reviews.text: item was delivered on time,the material that was used to make it is really soft, and my dog is comfortable in it, only thing is the sling is a little bit short when a big person uses it with the pet in it , otherwise it is a perfect carrier for a small dog and a just right size person.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s a good sling..
customer_reviews.text: The only thing is it could be a bit deeper...my dog is on the small side and and she barely fits..but it works and I will use it. I gave 4 stars because it’s such a fabulous idea and I will use it.. if a bit deeper , 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Irene Kenick

customer_reviews.title: Be careful of weight limit because...
customer_reviews.text: Beware of the weight limit posted by the seller. It stretches a lot so a heavier pet will pull you down instead of supporting you. My Westie mix enjoyed being carried like a puppy but after a few minutes my back was fighting gravity as the fabric stretched down. The construction is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: LivingandlearningTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this pet sling!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this pet sling! With just adding a new puppy to our family I am able to take all three of my dogs on the trail or anywhere that a dog is allowed to go. I anticipate using this till he can be able to walk and stay up with us. Little Tucker is able to get comfortable, sit up and be able to have a good view of everything. It was comical how people would make comment and say, "oh look at the puppy in the pocket." Would just make me smile. But it is so nice that he is able to join us on the trail walks.
customer_reviews.author: Airedale Mom

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Great
customer_reviews.text: I Just got a new fur-baby after 35 years, a little thing, trust me to protect her and for her security against other larger dogs a must-have, walking anywhere is a piece of mind, I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: WILLIAM GERHART JR

customer_reviews.title: I can NOT imagine a dog being balanced in this sling for more than 2 seconds
customer_reviews.text: Just seems to make no sense, very flimsy... I will probably just throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Darcy A. Rohde

customer_reviews.title: Consider your pets size when ordering this product.
customer_reviews.text: This product was a much better fit for my miniature dachshund then the first order. The pocket is deeper and the sling is adjustable. Both features were important to me as not just weight, but the size/shape of your pet makes a difference in terms of comfort and application. I'd recommend a size larger if your pet is near the upper weight limit for the size specified.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Brown

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfortable for small dogs
customer_reviews.text: My Dachshund puppy and my Yorkie love this sling. It keeps them close and safe when they want to be held and I am doing things around the house. They even fall asleep. It is very soft and the clip wraps around the handle, clips to itself and then to the harness. The harness (not around the neck.)
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer3T

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel on city streets
customer_reviews.text: The sling was perfect for our 10-month Havanese during a two-week vacation in Europe. I would like a slightly longer sling to be more Comfortable for taller users, like my husband. All in all, a great product, great value.
customer_reviews.author: ajax

customer_reviews.title: Indispensable for my workouts with Nellie
customer_reviews.text: Indispensable for my workouts with Nellie I like to take long walks for my work out. My dog Nellie likes to go with me even though she is small and gets tired. I used to have to switch arms back and forth while huffing and puffing. Now, we can both enjoy the workout, secure that she won't fall or I won't trip. I like that you can attach the leash to the sling. It is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Herman D

customer_reviews.title: Needs a pocket for phone, can clip your keys
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase! Our dog is 15 years old and a Yorkie weighing about 6.5 pounds. He has never been in anything like this and is very independent but liked this quite a bit while we were camping. Soft fabric, washes well and distributes weight well. Super comfy for dog and human. ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves this
customer_reviews.text: I have a little Yorkie/Maltese mix and he absolutely loves this thing. I take my little dude everywhere and hes so content just chilling in the little sling. the length of the strap could stand to be a touch longer but all in all this is a big hit.
customer_reviews.author: stanley forbes

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and calming
customer_reviews.text: Our kitten is hell on wheels so we got this pouch to keep him with us when we need to so we can get something done. He absolutely loves it. He goes for rides in the car in it and is totally content. It instantly calms him down and its comfy to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Tara m.

customer_reviews.title: Best for very small dogs
customer_reviews.text: This sling works well for my dogs because they are very small. They are 4.5 lbs each and I can carry one of them at a time. It is too small for them both to fit. I would only recommend this sling for very small dogs. The inevdrWback is that it is not adjustable but the benefit of no buckle adjustment is that it is more comfortable on your shoulder because nothing is digging into you.
customer_reviews.author: Patience Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Nice sling....
customer_reviews.text: My fiance and I were skeptical that our pup would stay in this sling, but he seemed to enjoy it! The material it's made of is a soft cloth, so it's not abrasive. The black one does not have an outside pocket, like displayed in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Riana Saint

customer_reviews.title: Fit for a Pup
customer_reviews.text: I love the design, reversibility, and softness. I think the size is for a smaller dog, not my 12-15lb Chiweenie. The colors are really cool and the reversible design is awesome, especially for guys to wear too (unisex). The seller is very responsive and helpful too. :)
customer_reviews.author: CookieC

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! We have a 13lb (long) Mini-Dachshund. He fits very well in this and is very comfortable. Some other bags weren't as forgiving and would choke him. This is loose enough to make him comfortable. I bought slightly larger size and it is perfect. I can tuck a blanket in with him for those really cold New England days. The clip for the harness is a little chincy, which is why I didn't give 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Works great, especially when leash is not appropriate.
customer_reviews.text: My dog looks adorable in this carrier. Strap is wide over the shoulder which provides more comfort. Glad I bought it. Very handy when a leash or dog stroller is not appropriate. Strap is not adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Bounce

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: My dog is 13 lbs. While he fits in this, it seems to be a bit small. I'd love it if it was just a bit bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Deb R

customer_reviews.title: Makes longer walks so much easier
customer_reviews.text: So at first I felt like this carrier was a bit shallow and awakward but I’ve come back to change my review. After messing around a bit with the way the dogs are sitting in and the way it is positioned on me it’s actually been working out really well. I use it for my female chihuahua mainly... because honestly she’s a little bit lazy lol. But both fit in very comfy and cozy. Great purchase :)
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Deeg

customer_reviews.title: Finally a perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: After trying several others, some were too bulky another had a plastic uncomfortable lining. I ordered the black so it is somewhat inconspicuous that I’m caring a pet. I am 5’4” and my 8 pound cavapoo puppy sits at just the perfect spot. As she gains a few more pounds she will still fit into it comfortably. Highly recommend very well built lightweight and most important comfy for your pet.
customer_reviews.author: debbie kennedy

customer_reviews.title: It's super deep so he has no problems staying inside and ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our dog who weighs 20 lbs because the snow and ice really bother his paws, and he loves this! It's super deep so he has no problems staying inside and he also stays nice and warm! It also was pretty padded on the shoulder area, so it's not too uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Karley

customer_reviews.title: It's also hard for him to get comfortable in because there is no surface or bottom for ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute bag, but the material is very stretchy, so it hangs very long with my dog inside. This puts stress on my shoulder and back, and when walking, my dog swings back and forth. It's also hard for him to get comfortable in because there is no surface or bottom for him to rest his feet on. The fabric is like sweatshirt material, and pilled within the first week of use. Cute idea, and I do use the bag... but it's not the great pup carrying solution I was hoping for. Not bad, considering the low price point.
customer_reviews.author: Crow Grando

customer_reviews.title: Great idea!
customer_reviews.text: I like this pet carrier as it is soft and comfortable (fleece material) to wear and cozy for the pet. my only concern is in hot weather it may be too hot for the pet. I have a very small dog 3.6bs and he fits all inside sometimes and get tired of standing up with his paws on the edge. average dog would work better as they can sit in it with head out as pictured.I would like to see a smaller size for really small dogs and puppies, like under 5lbs??
customer_reviews.author: DJSFO

customer_reviews.title: Snuggle time is all the time
customer_reviews.text: We love this little carrier for our 5 lb chihuahua, who likes walks (without walking, lol). I was simple enough to put on and we were ready to go out the door within 5 minutes. Super snuggly inside.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great product with just one flaw
customer_reviews.text: Great product with just one flaw. The strap is not adjustable. So, if you're tall like I am, it feels like you're carrying the dog around your chest rather than at your hip like in the picture. Also, even though my dog weighs just 9 lbs, carrying her around for a couple of hours - you really feel it! That's not a product flaw, just an observation.
customer_reviews.author: KatGrrlCT

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me.
customer_reviews.text: My 7 pound Chihuahua does not like it. She is awkward and stands straight up and I just can’t use it how I had intended... or at all.
customer_reviews.author: Matt & Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Nice for public transportation
customer_reviews.text: Have service dog. OK on public transportation, but needs to be contained, under control. Pet carrier does that, but needs a closure over top of the dog (velcro, buckle, etc.). We'll add one ourselves. Other than that, nice in that reversible and washable.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Belmont

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: This sling carrier is awesome!!! Soft and snuggly for my little Texas heeler pup. She can poke her little head out or go down in it for a nap. I have a larger red heeler who I take on walks and this helps free up my hands. 10/10 would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Byers

customer_reviews.title: Happy furry friend
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure if my dog would be ok with this sling, it made me a bit nervous as she could easily step out of it (the sides don’t raise up). But she sat in it and enjoyed been carried around... pretty good!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Very Useful!
customer_reviews.text: Great carrier! I have a 3.5lb teacup chihuahua and she loves to be held (yeah,she's not spoiled at all 🙄) but I don't always have time to hold her, so I bought this to use while I'm working around the house and I'm so glad I did. She loves it and it keeps he happy and safe (keeping her from being a trip hazard or her getting hurt). The fabric is soft but durable and can be easily washed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Carrier For My Little Dog!
customer_reviews.text: Soft and cozy. Secure and comfortable. I have a small dog and he has been happy in his carrier! It is made well and comfortable for me to carry around. Folds up small so I can put in my purse when I'm not using it.
customer_reviews.author: Kikimonkey

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: And, better yet, my dog seems to love it. Total surprise to me 'cause she is afraid of heights. But, apparently she feels very secure in the sling. And, isn't it cute!!!
customer_reviews.author: sharlene

customer_reviews.title: Makes carrying a puppy easy
customer_reviews.text: We have a new puppy who is still exploring and chewing. Not only will be able to use the sling when we're out, but I'm currently able to use it while in the house so I can get things done without having to worry about what the puppy might be chewing.
customer_reviews.author: Linda  Holody

product_meta.title: FurryFido Reversible Pet Sling Carrier for Cats Dogs up to 13+ lbs
product_meta.description: Color:BlackFurry Fido Classic Pet Sling is a reversible hand-free carrier bag made of breathable fabric for comfort featuring a safety collar hook for added security. The lightweight and convenient design is extra safe and strong so that you can go about your own business knowing that your pet is secure and comfortable. Furry Fido Classic Pet Sling is suitable for small pets up to 13 lbs, puppies and kittens, pets with disabilities, and traveling together.
feature_bullets: COMFORTABLE: Thanks to the soft cotton cloth material, this sling style bag will keep you and your pet relaxed and comfortable throughout the day.
MACHINE WASHABLE: Make your pet sling bag look and feel like new with a simple cold wash in your washing machine.
SAFE: This pet carrier bag holds your pet easily and it features a safety collar hook to ensure your pet is safe and secure.
REVERSIBLE: With a reversible design, this pet sling bag is not only convenient but looks great inside and out.
CONVENIENT: Easily tote your pets around town or during traveling with little effort. Thanks to the hands-free design!

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
